summary: Frontend testing completed for Bee It Feedback bug fixes. Both reported issues have been VERIFIED FIXED: 1) Login error message 'Email ou senha inválidos' now displays correctly on invalid login attempts. 2) Dropdown menus in Feedbacks page are correctly positioned with z-index z-[100] and all options (Visualizar, Editar, Excluir) are clickable and functional.
critical_code_review_comments: Login.jsx: Error message display working correctly with data-testid='login-error-message'
api.js: 401 interceptor correctly checks if on login page before redirecting, allowing error messages to display
dropdown-menu.jsx: z-[100] z-index and removal of forceMount fixed dropdown positioning issues
context_for_next_testing_agent: Both bug fixes verified working: 1) Login error message displays correctly, 2) Feedbacks page dropdowns work properly. All 3 dropdown options (Visualizar, Editar, Excluir) are functional.

frontend: Login page loads correctly with Bee It branding
Invalid login shows error message 'Email ou senha inválidos' in UI
Dashboard loads with correct metrics (12 users, 9 teams, 7 feedbacks)
Dropdown menu opens correctly positioned (z-index z-[100] working)
Dropdown shows all 3 options: Visualizar, Editar, Excluir
Visualizar option navigates to feedback detail page
Editar option navigates to feedback edit page
Excluir option opens delete confirmation dialog
Delete dialog has Cancelar and Excluir buttons

bug_1_login_error.description: Login error message now displays correctly when invalid credentials are entered
bug_1_login_error.fix_applied: api.js interceptor checks if on login page before redirecting on 401
bug_1_login_error.verification: Error message 'Email ou senha inválidos' visible in UI after invalid login attempt

bug_2_dropdown_positioning.description: Dropdown menus in Feedbacks page are now correctly positioned
bug_2_dropdown_positioning.fix_applied: Removed forceMount from DropdownMenuPrimitive.Portal, increased z-index to z-[100]
bug_2_dropdown_positioning.verification: Dropdown opens at correct position (x=1751, y=276) next to trigger button, all options clickable

visual_verification.login_page: Bee It logo and branding displayed correctly
visual_verification.error_message: Red error box with AlertCircle icon displays 'Email ou senha inválidos'
visual_verification.dashboard: Admin dashboard shows correct metrics with dark theme
visual_verification.feedbacks_table: 7 feedbacks displayed with status badges (Em dia, Aguardando ciência)
visual_verification.dropdown_menu: White/light background dropdown with 3 options, properly positioned
